snippet.title: Wolf 1994 Educational DOS Game
snippet.description:
Wolf was a surprise to say the least, the screenshots first drew me to play it. After which i found a shockingly well made game. Hunters, hunger, surviving the elements what more can you ask more when the first SIMS version was well,. a Wolf! a perfect game brought to us by Sanctuary Woods Inc. And I would love to play a more up to date version of this. My child loves it!

This game has been considered abandoned and had been taken off the shelf or has lost its copyright for various reasons.

[ ; wiki-note ; ] Abandonware are discontinued products for which no product support is available, or whose copyright ownership may be unclear for various reasons. Abandonware may be computer software or physical devices which are usually computerised in some fashion, such as personal computer games, productivity applications, utility software, or mobile phones.
